WG has apparently changed to be affected by GoN which results in about a 20% buff to WG.   This has been confirmed and added to the TreeCalcs spreadsheet so seems pretty safe to look at in the Tree module.   (I have no way of knowing if it already is or not).
WorkItem.Summary: [RestoDruid] Wild Growth now affected by Gift of Nature

Comments.Message: Thanks, it's fixed in the current version.
